Title: This Is Just Marketing
Writer: Stephen Falk (created by), Franklin Hardy, Shane Kosakowski, Philippe Iujvidin (story editor)
Actors: Chris Geere, Aya Cash, Desmin Borges, Kether Donohue
Plot: Jimmy learns that his literary novel is being marketed as erotica. While doing Vernon's podcast, Gretchen realizes she's been letting Jimmy off easy. When Edgar and Lindsay babysit Tallulah...
